'''Match Invitation Letter''' is an item used at the [[Invitation Board]] to invite characters to duel in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. They can be obtained by increasing [[Genius Invokation TCG#Player Level|Player Level]] and purchasing from [[Prince]] in the [[Genius Invokation TCG/Card Shop|Card Shop]].

Upon reaching Player Level 10, there is no longer a stock limit in the Card Shop, but a maximum of 10 Match Invitation Letters can be stored in the [[Inventory]] at a time.
